general.gigTitle: create wordpress website design, redesign wordpress business website development

sellerCard.oneLiner: Create a Unique Website using WordPress Expert
sellerCard.description:
Thanks for checking out my profile! My name is Harun Miah, but I'd prefer Harun! I am an experienced WordPress developer with over five years of experience working with the platform.

I have successfully crafted visually stunning and highly functional WordPress websites for a diverse range of clients across various industries.

Are you ready for your WordPress or WooCommerce projects to be supercharged with creativity and skills? I'm your guy. Feel free to message me with your needs and Get Your Dream Website Built By Our WordPress Experts.

description.content:
Hello Fiverr Buyers,


I specialize in creating stunning and functional web-sites using WordPress, tailored to meet the unique needs of businesses and individuals.


With a strong focus on user experience & aesthetics, I aim to deliver high-quality WordPress sites that engage & captivate visitors.



Field of Expertise:


WordPress Design or Redesign: Whether you need a new web-site or redesign your existing one, I can help. I create modern, user-friendly designs that reflect your brand identity


Responsive Design: I'm highly focused on responsive designs that are super mobile-friendly & support all devices


Website Optimization: I prioritize optimizing web-sites for speed & performance by leveraging caching techniques.


Page Builders: I mainly use popular WordPress page builders such as Elementor, Divi & WP Bakery to create visually appealing & dynamic web-sites.



I can build any WordPress web-site, including:


  • Business Web-site
  • Personal Blog or Portfolio Site
  • E-commerce Site
  • Sales/Landing Page



Why Me:


  • High-Quality Work
  • Experienced WordPress Developer
  • Quick Response & On-time Delivery



I'm always online; feel free to contact me & I'll bring your WordPress dreams to life!

slide.name: create wordpress website design, redesign wordpress business website development

questionsAndAnswers.question: When would you start the project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: After purchasing the project, Iâ€™ll wait for your requirements, like WordPress Cpanel login credentials, to get started. I'll start your project when you send me your Cpanel login credentials and chosen image and content.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need to build a WordPress Website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I'll need your WordPress admin or hosting/Cpanel login credentials with the reference website links or design (if you have one) and the content of your website, including logo, images, text, videos, etc.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you redesign an existing WordPress website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can redesign an existing WordPress website based on your requirements. Feel free to message me with your requirements; I will handle the rest.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What happens if I need support after completing the order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Good Question; I offer 30 days of free customer support (if needed) after completing the order.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will your design be responsive?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, my WordPress website design will be super responsive across all devices and browsers.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you have a portfolio to share?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can share some of my past work with you so that you can see the quality for yourself. Just send me a message, and I will provide them to you for your review.

reviews.comment: Collaborating with Harun on a website development project left room for improvement. The project didn't go as far as we wanted, but Harun tried as hard as we could to make it happen. Additionally, working with him was challenging due to language barriers.

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your kind words! It was a pleasure working with you, and I truly appreciate your feedback. I'm glad you had a great experience, and I look forward to collaborating again in the future!

reviews.comment: I mean this wholeheartedlyâ€”these are the best people Iâ€™ve worked with on Fiverr. They know what theyâ€™re doing and consistently deliver top-quality results. I highly recommend anyone looking to get a website to go with Harun Miahâ€”you wonâ€™t be disappointed. In fact, they should be Pro Level on Fiverr instead of Level 2â€”thatâ€™s how good they are!

seller_response.comment: Thanks for the kind and Inspiring words, your words make me work even harder. It was a pleasure to work with you. I'm glad that you're finding great benefits to my services. Wish you the best of luck and much success.

reviews.comment:
Working with Harun Miah in website development was a generally positive experience, although there were some challenges along the way. Improvements in attention to detail and communication skills, especially in language fluency, could enhance the overall collaborative process. Despite these hurdles, Harun was incredibly accommodating throughout the revisions, ultimately delivering a final product that matched my vision.

He was willing to do a zoom call with me to discuss my revisions live and helped me along the way. I didn't know the first thing about word press and now I can use it well enough to get by. Thank you Harun, I recommend him for any website projects you may have.

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback. It was a pleasure to work with you.

reviews.comment: Harun Miah did a great job on developing our website, resulting in an impressive final product. However, focusing more on attention to detail and enhancing proactiveness could improve future projects. Overall, the cooperation was positive, though ironing out bugs took some extra time and communication could be better.

seller_response.comment:
Thank you for your valuable feedback! I'm glad youâ€™re satisfied with the final outcome of your website. 

I truly appreciate your insights and will take them into account to further improve my attention to detail and communication. It was a pleasure working with you, and I hope to collaborate again in the future. 

Wishing you all the best with your website!

reviews.comment: I am very happy for hiring this guy to make my website. He is very responsive to messages, built a nice website and is a hard worker! Whenever he made a major change he would create a video explaining what he did.

seller_response.comment: I'm glad that you're finding great benefits to my services. Wish you the best of luck and much success.
